source:
TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_SEQ_00R'fhul Tia is mired in the depths of despair.
※This quest is available for a limited time only.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_SEQ_00* Cette quête est un événement à durée limitée.

R'fhul Tia, à Costa del Sol, semble profondément déprimé.

source:
TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_SEQ_01R'fhul is unresponsive to the sound of your voice. Mayhaps he needs a bigger gesture to wake him from his stupor, such as an attempt to comforthim.

※Please note that you will be unable to complete this quest after the seasonal event has ended. For details, please check the Lodestone.
target:
TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_SEQ_01Cette quête ne peut être commencée et effectuée que pendant la durée de l'événement saisonnier correspondant. Pour plus de détails, veuillez consulter The Lodestone.

Vous avez beau parler à R'fhul Tia, il ne fait que broyer du noir et vous répond à peine. Essayez tant bien que mal de le consoler.

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_SEQ_02<tab>After speaking with you and Beaudefoin, R'fhul Tia finally understands where he went wrong in his initial attempt through the Eorzean Nimble Warrior course. To inspire him to do his best, you have opted to join him in tackling the course this time. Speak with Beaudefoin to get started.
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_SEQ_02<tab>Baudefoin et vous avez su ouvrir les yeux à R'fhul Tia. Vous devez maintenant terminer le parcours pour lui montrer l'exemple à suivre. Parlez à Beaudefoin pour commencer.

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_SEQ_03<tab>You have begun your attempt through the Eorzean Nimble Warrior course. Speak with Hildelana upon reaching the first checkpoint.
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_SEQ_03<tab>Vous avez commencé le parcours du héros. Discutez avec Hildelana à mi-chemin.

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_SEQ_04<tab>You have made it past the first checkpoint. Speak with P'obyano upon reaching the end of the course.
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_SEQ_04<tab>Vous avez parcouru plus de la moitié du chemin Parlez à P'obyano à la ligne d'arrivée.

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_SEQ_05<tab>After completing the course, you proudly watched on from ahead as R'fhul Tia, following your example, tried his best to complete the course─and successfully managed to do so. While he rests, he suggests you take this opportunity to give R'mahja the good news.
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_SEQ_05<tab>Vous avez terminé le parcours du héros. R'fhul Tia, ayant suivi votre exemple, est également parvenu à atteindre la ligne d'arrivée. Allez lui parler.

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_SEQ_06<tab>After seeing their mentor try his best, R'fhul Tia and his impassioned pair of followers were able to make up. Your work concluded, it's time to report the day's events to Haermaga.
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_SEQ_06<tab>Après l'avoir vu donner le meilleur de lui-même durant le parcours, les disciples de R'fhul Tia sont finalement revenus à ses côtés. Annoncez à Haermaga qu'ils se sont réconciliés.

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_SEQ_07<tab>You have reported everything that happened to Haermaga. For the time being, it seems there is no need to worry about R'fhul Tia and his followers. It's time to kick back, don your reward, and enjoy the festivities.
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_SEQ_07<tab>Vous avez fait votre rapport à Hearmaga. Tout devrait bien se passer à l'avenir pour R'fhul Tia et ses disciples. Vous pouvez enfin être pleinement <var 08 E905 ((rassurée)) ((rassuré)) /var> et profiter des Feux de la Mort avec votre tenue flambant neuve.

target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_TODO_00<tab><var 1A 02 /var>/consoler<var 1A 01 /var> R'fhul Tia

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_TODO_01<tab>Speak with Beaudefoin.
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_TODO_01<tab>Parler à Beaudefoin

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_TODO_02<tab>Speak with Hildelana.

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RMAJHA_100_002<tab>Please <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, you have to do something! I've never seen my brother like this...
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RMAJHA_100_002<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, remontez le morrral de mon frère, s'il vous plaît<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RFHULTIA_000_000<tab>Wh-Why... What did I do wrong?
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RFHULTIA_000_000<tab>Pourrrquoi... Qu'est-ce que j'ai fait de mal<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RMAJHA_000_001<tab>I don't think words can reach him with the state he's in right now...
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RMAJHA_000_001<tab>Il a vrrraiment du mal à s'en remettre...

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RMAJHA_100_001<tab>Maybe you could try to <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>comfort<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> him? There's no one he respects more than you, so if that doesn't work, I don't know what will!
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RMAJHA_100_001<tab>Essayez de le <var 1A 02 /var>consoler<var 1A 01 /var>. Il vous respecte plus que tout, je suis sûrrre que vos paroles l'aideront à aller mieux<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RMAJHA_000_002<tab>Please <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>comfort<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> him, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RMAJHA_000_002<tab>Essayez de <var 1A 02 /var>consoler<var 1A 01 /var> Fhul Tia, s'il vous plaît<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RFHULTIA_000_010<tab><sniff> How could this happen...I don't understand...
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RFHULTIA_000_010<tab>Pourrrquoi... Je comprends pas... Snif...

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_SYSTEM_000_011<tab>R'fhul Tia is gravely despondent. Perhaps <var 48 F201F4 /var><var 49 F201F5 /var>comfort<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> from the person he looks up to will do him some good.
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_SYSTEM_000_011<tab>R'fhul Tia a le moral dans les chaussettes, essayez de le <var 1A 02 /var>consoler<var 1A 01 /var>.

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RFHULTIA_000_011<tab>Thank you for showing me such kindness, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I'm still trying to wrap my head around why those two left. Is it because I failed the course? Because I looked pathetic?
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RFHULTIA_000_011<tab>Merci, vos paroles me réchauffent le cœur. Mais qu'est-ce qui a bien pu les décevoirrr, exactement<var 1D /var>? Me voir échouer d'un air lamentable<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RMAJHA_000_012<tab>No, you dummy, that's not it at all!
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RMAJHA_000_012<tab>Mais non, c'est pas ça du tout<var 1D /var>! Tu comprends vraiment rrrien à rien, toi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RFHULTIA_000_013<tab>What do you mean? <gulp> It's not because I looked...pathetic?
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RFHULTIA_000_013<tab>Quoi, comment ça<var 1D /var>? C'est pas parrrce que j'avais l'air nul<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RFHULTIA_100_013<tab>Erm... Say, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, do you have any idea why?
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RFHULTIA_100_013<tab>Mh...<var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>, vous aurrriez pas une idée, vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_Q1_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_Q1_000_000<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_A1_000_001<tab>It's because you failed. Miserably.
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_A1_000_001<tab>C'est parce que tu as échoué.

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_A1_000_002<tab>You weren't taking it seriously.
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_A1_000_002<tab>C'est parce que tu n'étais pas sérieux.

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_A1_000_003<tab>You tried to hide from your mistakes.
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_A1_000_003<tab>C'est parce que tu te la jouais.

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RMAJHA_000_014<tab>That's true, but that's not the point! It's because he wasn't taking it seriously!
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RMAJHA_000_014<tab>C'est pas com<var 16 /var>plè<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment faux, mais pas com<var 16 /var>plè<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment exact. C'est parrrce que t'étais pas sérieux<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RMAJHA_000_015<tab>Exactly, <var 08 E905 ((she)) ((he)) /var>'s exactly right! You didn't take the challenge seriously at all!
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RMAJHA_000_015<tab>Voilà quelqu'un qui sait réfléchir<var 1D /var>! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> a entièrrrement raison<var 1D /var>! T'étais pas sérieux du tout<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RMAJHA_000_016<tab>Hide...from a mistake? I don't quite understand, but it sounds wise! You didn't look like you were really trying, Fhul!
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RMAJHA_000_016<tab>Se la jouer...<var 1D /var>? Je comprends pas bien, mais ça doit être ça<var 1D /var>! T'étais pas sérrrieux<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RFHULTIA_000_017<tab>I wasn't being serious...? That's not true─I assure you, I was trying my darnedest to look cool in front of everybody...
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RFHULTIA_000_017<tab>S-sérieux...<var 1D /var>? Mais si, je l'étais<var 1D /var>! Je voulais leur montrrrer que j'avais la classe...

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RMAJHA_000_018<tab>Ugh, you're so dense I can hardly believe we're related! Maybe I'll just have to give the course a shot myself, and show you what trying <var 1A 02 /var>really<var 1A 01 /var> looks like!
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RMAJHA_000_018<tab>Rah, y en a marre, t'es vrrraiment bête<var 1D /var>! Puisque c'est comme ça, je vais participer et te montrer ce que c'est, d'être sérieux<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_BEAUDEFOIN_000_019<tab>(-???-)My, that is some <var 1A 02 /var>remarkable<var 1A 01 /var> gumption you have there little miss! Alas, I'm afraid children may not, under absolutely any circumstances, participate in the competition.
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_BEAUDEFOIN_000_019<tab>(-???-)Hop là, la demoiselle<var 1D /var>! J'admire ta bravoure, mais les enfants n'ont pas le droit de participer<var 1D /var>! Question de sécurité.

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_BEAUDEFOIN_000_020<tab>(-Beaudefoin-)I hope you don't mind, but I overheard your conversation. My opinion? You're a pathetic excuse for an adventurer, R'fhul. Just awful.
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_BEAUDEFOIN_000_020<tab>(-Beaudefoin-)J'ai entendu votre discussion... R'fhul Tia, tu es bien lamentable pour un aventurier accompli.

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RFHULTIA_000_021<tab>O-Oh... I'm sorry. You taught me so much, yet I put on such a miserable performance. Everyone must think I'm a loser...
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RFHULTIA_000_021<tab>Je... Désolé, j'ai manqué de classe malgrrré tout ce que vous m'avez appris...

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_BEAUDEFOIN_000_022<tab>(-Beaudefoin-)Just listen to yourself, lad. You want to know what your problem is? You only care about appearances─whether you this way or that. You've lost sight of what's truly important.
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_BEAUDEFOIN_000_022<tab>(-Beaudefoin-)Tu recommences avec ça<var 1D /var>? La classe ceci, la classe cela, tu n'as que ce mot à la bouche<var 1D /var>? Tu oublies le plus important.

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_BEAUDEFOIN_000_023<tab>(-Beaudefoin-)Think back. Try to recall what Haermaga and I taught you─what it was that you admired about <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> in the first place.
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_BEAUDEFOIN_000_023<tab>(-Beaudefoin-)Souviens-toi un peu de ce que Haermaga et moi t'avons appris. De la raison pour laquelle tu admires <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>.

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RFHULTIA_000_024<tab>I...I think I finally understand. I was so focused on trying to impress my followers that I didn't fully commit myself to overcoming the challenge. Nay, I just put on a performance...
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RFHULTIA_000_024<tab>Je comprends maintenant... J'ai été com<var 16 /var>plè<var 16 /var>te<var 16 /var>ment stupide... Je pensais qu'aux apparences sans être sérrrieux...

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RFHULTIA_000_025<tab>I─I betrayed their trust, and now they've seen me for what I truly am: a failure. There's no way I could make it up to them...
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RFHULTIA_000_025<tab>Quel nul, j'ai trahi la confiance de mes disciples<var 1D /var>! Je suis un piètre aven<var 16 /var>tu<var 16 /var>rrrier... Comment je pourrais me racheter auprès d'eux<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RMAJHA_000_026<tab>What if you gave the course another shot, but took it seriously this time? You could start from the area nearest here. I bet those two would watch!
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RMAJHA_000_026<tab>Eh bien refais le parcours, mais en t'y mettant vraiment, cette fois<var 1D /var>! Commence par l'endroit le plus proche, je suis sûrrre qu'ils te regarderont faire<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RFHULTIA_000_027<tab>Again? But I've never actually succeeded. If I were to fail once more, I'd lose their respect forever...
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RFHULTIA_000_027<tab>Tu veux que je réessaye...<var 1D /var>? Mais j'ai jamais réussi une seule fois, si j'échoue encorrre, ils vont vraiment me détester, c'est sûr...

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_Q2_000_000<tab>What will you say?
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_Q2_000_000<tab>Que dites-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_A2_000_001<tab>It doesn't matter if you fail or succeed. What matters is that you try.
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_A2_000_001<tab>Ce n'est pas le résultat qui compte<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_A2_000_002<tab>Show us what it means to be an adventurer!
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_A2_000_002<tab>Donne-toi à fond, aventurier<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RFHULTIA_000_028<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>... Thank you! I nearly made the same mistake all over again. This time, I promise you, I will succeed, or─preferably─not quite die trying!
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RFHULTIA_000_028<tab><var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>... Merci de m'avoir ouverrrt les yeux<var 1D /var>! Un peu plus et je répétais la même erreur... Cette fois, je vais me concentrer sur le parcours et arrêter de penser au reste<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RFHULTIA_000_029<tab>What it means to be an adventurer... You're right! Thoughts of failure or success will only weigh me down. My sole focus needs to be on the challenge that lies before me!
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RFHULTIA_000_029<tab>Me donner à fond... Oui, vous avez raison<var 1D /var>! Je dois pas me préoccuper de la victoirrre, je vais me concentrer sur le parcours<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RFHULTIA_000_030<tab>I'm sorry to ask more of you when you've already done so much for me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─but can I ask you to serve as my inspiration once more? If possible, I would like you to go through the course before me.
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RFHULTIA_000_030<tab>Vous voulez bien me prêter main forte<var 1D /var>? J'aimerrrais que vous fassiez le parcours juste devant moi.

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RFHULTIA_000_031<tab>Seeing you take it on would rekindle those aspirations of becoming a great adventurer that I once held in my heart. Please, help me to reclaim that dream─let me follow in your footsteps!
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RFHULTIA_000_031<tab>Je suis sûrrr que ça me motivera de suivre les pas de <var 08 E905 ((celle)) ((celui)) /var> que j'admire. Aidez-moi à être plus sérieux que je l'ai jamais été<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RFHULTIA_000_032<tab>You doing this─it means the world to me, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I will follow after you with everything I have!
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RFHULTIA_000_032<tab>Merrrci du fond du cœur, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! Je vais tout faire pour être comme vous<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RMAJHA_000_033<tab>You can do it, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RMAJHA_000_033<tab>Bon courage, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RFHULTIA_000_034<tab>I know I can do my best if I'm following after you. When you begin your run through the course, I'll be there, right behind you.
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RFHULTIA_000_034<tab>Je sais que je pourrai donner le meilleurrr de moi-même en prenant exemple sur vous. Faites le parcours devant moi, s'il vous plaît<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_BEAUDEFOIN_000_040<tab>There you are, I've been waiting for you! I appreciate you looking out for R'fhul, by the way. But such talk can come later─the jet of water yonder is roaring with foam in anticipation!
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_BEAUDEFOIN_000_040<tab>Haha, je t'attendais<var 1D /var>! C'est bien gentil à toi de t'occuper de R'fhul Tia. Allez, laisse-toi porter par le courant d'air et commence le parcours<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_SYSTEM_100_040<tab>Should completing the Eorzean Nimble Warrior course prove difficult, seek out a Faire Adventurer for assistance.
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_SYSTEM_100_040<tab>Discutez avec l'aventurier de l'Éternel été si vous trouvez le parcours trop difficile.

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_BEAUDEFOIN_000_041<tab>Forget about R'fhul while you're jumping through obstacles, dodging bombs, and what have you─just relax and have a good time! That will prove more fruitful to the lad in the end, anyway.
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_BEAUDEFOIN_000_041<tab>Ne pense pas trop à R'fhul Tia pendant ton parcours, contente-toi de profiter<var 1D /var>! Je suis sûr que c'est aussi mieux pour lui.

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_ADVENTURERA04541_000_042<tab>Whoa...it's really you! A legend like yourself could probably get through this silly ol' course with your eyes closed. That would be something to see─care to show the amateurs how it's done?
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_ADVENTURERA04541_000_042<tab>Héhé, t'as l'air plutôt <var 08 E905 ((forte)) ((fort)) /var>, toi. Je suis sûr qu'<var 08 E905 ((une)) ((un)) /var> <var 08 E905 ((aventurière)) ((aventurier)) /var> de ta trempe peut s'en sortir les yeux fermés. Alors, tu veux tenter<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_SYSTEM_000_043<tab>Undertake the course with your eyes closed to gracefully make your way to the end of the first platforming section.
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_SYSTEM_000_043<tab>Si vous participez les yeux fermés, vous serez téléport<var 08 E905 ((ée)) ((é)) /var> à mi-parcours.

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_Q4_000_000<tab>Amaze the onlookers and yourself by undertaking the course with your eyes closed?
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_Q4_000_000<tab>Voulez-vous participer les yeux fermés<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_Q5_000_001<tab>Are you sure?
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_Q5_000_001<tab>Vous serez téléport<var 08 E905 ((ée)) ((é)) /var> à mi-parcours. Voulez-vous continuer<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_HILDELANA_000_050<tab>Beaudefoin's kept me abreast of the situation, and after seeing the way you've carried yourself through the course so far, R'fhul's <var 1A 02 /var>gotta<var 1A 01 /var> be fired up!
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_HILDELANA_000_050<tab>Beaudefoin m'a raconté ce qu'il s'est passé. Je suis certaine que R'fhul Tia retrouvera sa passion brûlante en vous voyant à l'œuvre.

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_HILDELANA_000_051<tab>You've already made it halfway through the course. Not like you need to hear it from me, but good luck!
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_HILDELANA_000_051<tab>Allez, courage, il ne reste plus que la moitié du parcours<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_SYSTEM_100_051<tab>Should completing the Eorzean Nimble Warrior course prove difficult, seek out a Faire Adventurer for assistance.
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_SYSTEM_100_051<tab>Discutez avec l'aventurier de l'Éternel été si vous trouvez le parcours trop difficile.

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_HILDELANA_000_052<tab>Just halfway to go! Break a leg out there, y'hear? Er, not literally─you know what I mean.
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_HILDELANA_000_052<tab>Allez, courage, il ne reste plus que la moitié du parcours<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_ADVENTURERB04541_000_053<tab>Well, well, well, what do we have here...an adventurer head and shoulders above the rest. If this is to prove a challenge to you, you need a handicap. Why not do it blind?  You're not afraid of a little danger...are ya?
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_ADVENTURERB04541_000_053<tab>Héhé, j'espérais qu'<var 08 E905 ((une)) ((un)) /var> <var 08 E905 ((aventurière)) ((aventurier)) /var> comme toi se présente. Que quelqu'un soit capable de me terminer ce parcours les yeux fermés... C'est ton cas, pas vrai<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_SYSTEM_000_054<tab>Undertake the course with your eyes closed to gracefully make your way to the end of the course.
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_SYSTEM_000_054<tab>Si vous continuez les yeux fermés, vous serez téléport<var 08 E905 ((ée)) ((é)) /var> à la fin du parcours.

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_Q6_000_000<tab>Make the cheeky faire adventurer cower before your blinding courage by undertaking the course with your eyes closed?
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_Q6_000_000<tab>Voulez-vous continuer les yeux fermés<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_Q7_000_001<tab>Are you sure?
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_Q7_000_001<tab>Vous serez téléport<var 08 E905 ((ée)) ((é)) /var> à la fin du parcours. Voulez-vous continuer<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_POBYANO_000_060<tab>Congratulations on making it to the end! Ah, I should mention that I've heard about the situation with R'fhul. He pursued you the entire time, never giving up despite the fear in his eyes. Even now...hey, look behind you!
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_POBYANO_000_060<tab>Vous voici à la ligne d'arrivée, félicitations<var 1D /var>! On m'a raconté ce qu'il s'est passé. R'fhul Tia faisait son maximum pour vous suivre. Regarrrdez, il n'est plus très loin<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_Q3_000_000<tab>What will you shout?
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_Q3_000_000<tab>Comment l'encouragez-vous<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_A3_000_001<tab>Remember! Remember what it means to be an adventurer!
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_A3_000_001<tab>Montre ce que tu sais faire<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_A3_000_002<tab>Do not waver! You can do this!
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_A3_000_002<tab>Alleeez<var 1D /var>! Un dernier effort<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RFHULTIA_000_061<tab>I did it, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! I really did it! And I managed to do it all because of you. I cannot thank you enough!
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RFHULTIA_000_061<tab>J'ai réussi, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var><var 1D /var>! J'ai donné tout ce que j'avais et terminé le parcours<var 1D /var>! C'est grrrâce à vous, tout ça<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RFHULTIA_000_062<tab>Hah, now that I've made it to the end, it seems my nerves've caught up to me... Forgive me, I will return after I've had a moment to rest. Would you mind relaying the good news to Mahja?
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RFHULTIA_000_062<tab>Maintenant que c'est terminé, la fatigue me rattrape d'un coup... Je vais me rrreposer ici encore un peu, vous pouvez annoncer le résultat à Mahja<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_BEAUDEFOIN_000_063<tab>Bravo, bravo! A job well done─though I expected no less.
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_BEAUDEFOIN_000_063<tab>Haha, tout s'est passé comme sur des roulettes<var 1D /var>! Je savais que tu en étais capable. Bravo<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_HILDELANA_000_064<tab>Expertly done, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! Seems R'fhul managed to keep behind you the whole way. I guess a seasoned adventurer like you can bring out the best in anyone!
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_HILDELANA_000_064<tab>Vous étiez vraiment <var 08 E905 ((im<var 16 /var>pres<var 16 /var>sion<var 16 /var>nante)) ((im<var 16 /var>pres<var 16 /var>sion<var 16 /var>nant)) /var><var 1D /var>! R'fhul Tia est lui aussi parvenu au bout. Quoi de plus normal pour les aventuriers que vous êtes<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_POBYANO_000_065<tab>I was absolutely moved by─well, the way you moved up there! And frankly, it was even more touching to see how R'fhul seemed to gain confidence as he pushed on. This is the way adventurers are meant to be!
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_POBYANO_000_065<tab>J'étais absolument fascinée par votre parcours<var 1D /var>! Et parrr celui de R'fhul Tia aussi<var 1D /var>! Vous êtes de vrais aventuriers<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RFHULTIA_000_066<tab>Hah, sorry I couldn't keep up with you to the very end. My heart may very well burst out of my chest if it beats any faster, so I'm gonna lie down here for a bit... In the meantime, please let Mahja know what happened.
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RFHULTIA_000_066<tab>Haha, désolé de me rrrelâcher sur la fin, mais j'ai besoin d'un peu de repos. Vous pouvez annoncer le résultat à Mahja<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RMAJHA_000_070<tab>Oh, you're back! How'd it go? Beaudefoin and Haermaga were commentating, but I want to hear about how it went from your perspective!
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RMAJHA_000_070<tab>Alors, comment ça s'est passé<var 1D /var>? Beaudefoin et Haermaga ont commenté, mais j'aimerais entendre toute l'histoire de votre bouche<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RMAJHA_000_071<tab>He did it─he really did it! I always believed Fhul could, but he never believed it himself. I'm so happy...
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RMAJHA_000_071<tab>Fhul Tia a donc vraiment donné le meilleur de lui-même pendant le parcourrrs<var 1D /var>! C'est super, il est trop fort<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RMAJHA_000_072<tab>Fhul! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> told me <var 1A 02 /var>everything<var 1A 01 /var>. I'm so proud of you!
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RMAJHA_000_072<tab>Fhul Tia, tu tombes bien<var 1D /var>! <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var> m'a tout raconté<var 1D /var>! Je suis fièrrre de toi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RFHULTIA_000_073<tab>Oh, I didn't do much, really. I just followed after <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>─I owe it all to <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var>, honestly. Still...it felt good to try, and finally succeed at doing something.
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RFHULTIA_000_073<tab>J'en serais pas arrivé là sans son aide... Mais j'ai pu tout donner et terminer le parrrcours<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_ADVENTURERB04541_000_074<tab>Please excuse us for interrupting, R'fhul Tia. Do you have a moment?
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_ADVENTURERB04541_000_074<tab>R'fhul Tia, nous aimerions te parler un instant, si tu veux bien.

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_ADVENTURERA04541_000_075<tab>We─We were wrong about you. Yet we said such horrible things... It was only when we saw you making your way through the course that it dawned on us how cruel we'd been.
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_ADVENTURERA04541_000_075<tab>En te voyant faire le parcours, on s'est dit qu'on avait été un peu durs avec toi...

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_ADVENTURERA04541_100_075<tab>That's why...
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_ADVENTURERA04541_100_075<tab>Alors, euh...

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RFHULTIA_000_075<tab>You don't need to finish that sentence. I'm the one in the wrong here, after all. I...I am so very sorry, both of you!
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RFHULTIA_000_075<tab>N'en dites pas plus. Si quelqu'un doit prrrésenter ses excuses ici, c'est moi. Je suis vraiment désolé<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RFHULTIA_000_076<tab>I let my desire for recognition cloud my judgment, and lost sight of what it truly means to be an adventurer. It's little wonder you both lost faith in me─everything you said, it was all true!
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RFHULTIA_000_076<tab>Je voulais qu'on me reconnaisse en tant qu'aven<var 16 /var>tu<var 16 /var>rrrier accompli, et je me préoccupais que des apparences, oubliant ce qu'il y a de plus important. C'est normal que vous ayez été déçus<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RFHULTIA_000_077<tab>That's why I'm starting over, and retaking my first step as an adventurer, right here and right now. This time, I will not waver from the path─nay, I shall follow wherever it leads, as a true adventurer should! With that said...do you think you could forgive me?
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RFHULTIA_000_077<tab>Je vais prrrendre un nouveau départ<var 1D /var>! Je me comporterai avec sérieux, dorénavant. Alors... Vous voulez bien me pardonner<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_ADVENTURERB04541_000_078<tab>I'll be honest─you were a hideous sight up there at first, looking liable to break down crying at any moment. But you didn't. You pushed through─which was extremely cool, by the way─and now I'm keen to see how far you'll go. Just like when I first met you.
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_ADVENTURERB04541_000_078<tab>Tu étais certes lamentable la dernière fois, mais te voir donner le meilleur de toi-même m'a fait changer d'avis. C'est ça, avoir la classe. Tu es enfin redevenu celui que j'ai connu.

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_ADVENTURERA04541_000_079<tab>That's why we want you to forgive us...for losing faith, instead of believing in you like we should've. Given the circumstances, I understand if you say no, but... Would you let us follow you once again?
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_ADVENTURERA04541_000_079<tab>On voudrait aussi que tu nous pardonnes... Tu veux bien nous considérer à nouveau comme tes disciples<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RFHULTIA_000_080<tab>Like you even have to ask! You two will always be welcome. I guess the three of us are taking our first steps anew, together!
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RFHULTIA_000_080<tab>La question se pose même pas<var 1D /var>! Nous allons tous les trois repartirrr à zéro<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RMAJHA_000_081<tab>Thanks for bringing Fhul back to his senses, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>! If you hadn't, the three of them never would've made up, and I would still be really sad. So...thank you, so, so much!
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RMAJHA_000_081<tab>Je suis si contente qu'ils se soient réconciliés<var 1D /var>! C'est grâce à vous, merci pourrr tout<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RMAJHA_000_082<tab>I think we'll be okay now, so maybe you can do that “report” thing that Fhul always talks about? I don't really get it, but it seems important. And don't you worry about Fhul─I'll be watching him carefully!
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RMAJHA_000_082<tab>Fhul Tia m'a dit que c'est superrr important pour les aventuriers de faire leurs rapports, vous devriez aller faire le vôtre et dire que tout va bien maintenant<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RFHULTIA_000_083<tab>This whole ordeal started because of my own foolishness, yet you still extended your hand out to me. I've said it before, and I'll say it again─you, my friend, are my inspiration!
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RFHULTIA_000_083<tab>J'ai été vraiment stupide, mais vous m'avez chaleureusement tendu la main, en étant <var 08 E905 ((dure)) ((dur)) /var> quand il le fallait. Je vous admire vrrraiment<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_ADVENTURERA04541_000_084<tab>Our mentor's mentor... Does that make you our Grandmentor? It's like we're all one big family! Heh, it's been an honor, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>!
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_ADVENTURERA04541_000_084<tab>Vous êtes le boss du boss... Donc mon grand boss<var 1D /var>! Je chérirai notre rencontre toute ma vie, héhé<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_ADVENTURERB04541_000_085<tab>My entire life, everyone around me has called me cold...but watching you and R'fhul tackle the course lit a fire inside of me. I know now what I aspire to be.
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_ADVENTURERB04541_000_085<tab>On me dit souvent que je suis quelqu'un de froid, mais vous voir R'fhul Tia et vous m'a réchauffé le cœur... Je sais maintenant à quoi aspirer en tant qu'aventurière.

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RMAJHA_000_086<tab>Did my brother thank you properly? Well, let me thank you again just to be safe! Ah, and please don't forget about the “report” thing!
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_RMAJHA_000_086<tab>Merci encorrre pour votre aide<var 1D /var>! Vous devriez aller faire votre rapport, maintenant.

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_BEAUDEFOIN_000_087<tab>My, what a satisfying conclusion to this tale! You simply <var 1A 02 /var>must<var 1A 01 /var> regale it to Haermaga in all its glory!
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_BEAUDEFOIN_000_087<tab>Haha, tout est bien qui finit bien, tant mieux<var 1D /var>! Va raconter la fin de cette histoire à Haermaga.

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_HAERMAGA_000_090<tab>I could roughly see what happened from here, but I'd appreciate it if you could fill in the blanks.
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_HAERMAGA_000_090<tab>Oh, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. J'ai vu ce qu'il s'est passé, mais tu veux bien me faire ton rapport<var 1D /var>?

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_HAERMAGA_000_091<tab>So the lad finally came to his senses in the end, eh? And he made up with those greenhorns while he was at it, too. You did well, <var 2C ((<var 29 EB02 /var>)) (( )) 02 /var>. I was right to count on you.
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_HAERMAGA_000_091<tab>Je vois, R'fhul Tia a donc enfin ouvert les yeux et s'est réconcilié avec ses disciples. Ta mission est terminée, je savais que je pouvais compter sur toi<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_HAERMAGA_000_092<tab>With that, he's truly made his first step as a proper adventurer─and better yet, I don't have to feel anxious about leaving the three of 'em to their own devices anymore. You reminded all of 'em of what it truly means to be an adventurer.
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_HAERMAGA_000_092<tab>C'est vraiment un aventurier accompli, maintenant. On peut lui confier ses disciples sans crainte. C'est grâce à toi, tout ça.

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_HAERMAGA_000_093<tab>Speaking of adventurers, I owe you a reward, don't I? Please, take this─you've more than earned it. And hey, do try to enjoy the Moonfire Faire while it's around, y'hear?
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_HAERMAGA_000_093<tab>Merci pour ton aide. Tiens, accepte cette récompense et oublie pas de profiter des Feux de la Mort<var 1D /var>!

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_HAERMAGA_100_000<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_HAERMAGA_100_000<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）

source: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_BEAUDEFOIN_100_001<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
target: TEXT_FESSUM802_04541_BEAUDEFOIN_100_001<tab>（★未使用／削除予定★）
